verses.verse: There is therefore<WG686> now<WG3568> no<WG3762> condemnation<WG2631> for those<WG3588> who are in Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
For the law<WG3551> of the Spirit<WG4151> of life<WG2222> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> has set<WG1659> you free<WG1659> from the law<WG3551> of sin<WG266> and of death.<WG2288>

For what<WG102> the Law<WG3551> could<WG102> not do, weak<WG770> as it was through<WG1223> the flesh,<WG4561> God<WG2316> [did: ] sending<WG3992> His own<WG1438> Son<WG5207> in the likeness<WG3667> of sinful<WG266> flesh<WG4561> and [as an offering] for sin,<WG266> He condemned<WG2632> sin<WG266> in the flesh,<WG4561>

in order<WG2443> that the requirement<WG1345> of the Law<WG3551> might be fulfilled<WG4137> in us, who do not walk<WG4043> according<WG2596> to the flesh,<WG4561> but according<WG2596> to the Spirit.<WG4151>

For those<WG3588> who are according<WG2596> to the flesh<WG4561> set<WG5426> their minds<WG5426> on the things of the flesh,<WG4561> but those<WG3588> who are according<WG2596> to the Spirit,<WG4151> the things of the Spirit.<WG4151>
For the mind<WG5427> set<WG5427> on the flesh<WG4561> is death,<WG2288> but the mind<WG5427> set<WG5427> on the Spirit<WG4151> is life<WG2222> and peace,<WG1515>

because<WG1360> the mind<WG5427> set<WG5427> on the flesh<WG4561> is hostile<WG2189> toward<WG1519> God;<WG2316> for it does not subject<WG5293> itself to the law<WG3551> of God,<WG2316> for it is not even<WG3761> able<WG1410> [to do so];
and those<WG3588> who are in the flesh<WG4561> cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> please<WG700> God.<WG2316>

However,<WG1161> you are not in the flesh<WG4561> but in the Spirit,<WG4151> if<WG1512> indeed<WG1512> the Spirit<WG4151> of God<WG2316> dwells<WG3611> in you. But if<WG1487> anyone<WG5100> does not have<WG2192> the Spirit<WG4151> of Christ,<WG5547> he does not belong<WG1510> to Him.

And if<WG1487> Christ<WG5547> is in you, though<WG3303> the body<WG4983> is dead<WG3498> because<WG1223> of sin,<WG266> yet<WG1161> the spirit<WG4151> is alive<WG2222> because<WG1223> of righteousness.<WG1343>

But if<WG1487> the Spirit<WG4151> of Him who raised<WG1453> Jesus<WG2424> from the dead<WG3498> dwells<WG3611> in you, He who raised<WG1453> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> from the dead<WG3498> will also<WG2532> give<WG2227> life<WG2227> to your mortal<WG2349> bodies<WG4983> through<WG1223> His Spirit<WG4151> who indwells<WG1774> you.
So<WG686> then,<WG686> brethren,<WG80> we are under<WG3781> obligation,<WG3781> not to the flesh,<WG4561> to live<WG2198> according<WG2596> to the flesh<WG4561> â€“

for if<WG1487> you are living<WG2198> according<WG2596> to the flesh,<WG4561> you must<WG3195> die;<WG599> but if<WG1487> by the Spirit<WG4151> you are putting<WG2289> to death<WG2289> the deeds<WG4234> of the body,<WG4983> you will live.<WG2198>
For all<WG3745> who<WG3745> are being led<WG71> by the Spirit<WG4151> of God,<WG2316> these<WG3778> are sons<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>

For you have not received<WG2983> a spirit<WG4151> of slavery<WG1397> leading<WG1519> to fear<WG5401> again,<WG3825> but you have received<WG2983> a spirit<WG4151> of adoption<WG5206> as sons<WG5206> by which<WG3739> we cry<WG2896> out, "Abba! Father!<WG5>"
The Spirit<WG4151> Himself<WG846> bears<WG4828> witness<WG4828> with our spirit<WG4151> that we are children<WG5043> of God,<WG2316>

and if<WG1487> children,<WG5043> heirs<WG2818> also,<WG2532> heirs<WG2818> of God<WG2316> and fellow<WG4789> heirs<WG4789> with Christ,<WG5547> if<WG1512> indeed<WG1512> we suffer<WG4841> with [Him] in order<WG2443> that we may also<WG2532> be glorified<WG4888> with [Him.]
For I consider<WG3049> that the sufferings<WG3804> of this<WG3588> present<WG3568> time<WG2540> are not worthy<WG514> to be compared with the glory<WG1391> that is to be revealed<WG601> to us.
For the anxious<WG603> longing<WG603> of the creation<WG2937> waits<WG553> eagerly<WG553> for the revealing<WG602> of the sons<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>
For the creation<WG2937> was subjected<WG5293> to futility,<WG3153> not of its own<WG1635> will,<WG1635> but because<WG1223> of Him who subjected<WG5293> it, in hope<WG1680>

that the creation<WG2937> itself<WG846> also<WG2532> will be set<WG1659> free<WG1659> from its slavery<WG1397> to corruption<WG5356> into the freedom<WG1657> of the glory<WG1391> of the children<WG5043> of God.<WG2316>
For we know<WG3609> that the whole<WG3956> creation<WG2937> groans<WG4959> and suffers<WG4944> the pains<WG4944> of childbirth<WG4944> together<WG4959> <WG4944> until<WG891> now.<WG3568>

And not only<WG3440> this, but also<WG2532> we ourselves,<WG846> having<WG2192> the first<WG536> fruits<WG536> of the Spirit,<WG4151> even<WG2532> we ourselves<WG846> groan<WG4727> within<WG1722> ourselves,<WG1438> waiting<WG553> eagerly<WG553> for [our] adoption<WG5206> as sons,<WG5206> the redemption<WG629> of our body.<WG4983>
For in hope<WG1680> we have been saved,<WG4982> but hope<WG1680> that is seen<WG991> is not hope;<WG1680> for why<WG5101> does one<WG5100> also<WG2532> hope<WG1679> for what<WG3739> he sees<WG991>?
But if<WG1487> we hope<WG1679> for what<WG3739> we do not see,<WG991> with perseverance<WG5281> we wait<WG553> eagerly<WG553> for it.

And in the same<WG5615> way<WG5615> the Spirit<WG4151> also<WG2532> helps<WG4878> our weakness;<WG769> for we do not know<WG3609> how<WG5101> to pray<WG4336> as we should,<WG1163> but the Spirit<WG4151> Himself<WG846> intercedes<WG5241> for [us] with groanings<WG4726> too<WG215> deep<WG215> for words;<WG215>

and He who searches<WG2045> the hearts<WG2588> knows<WG3609> what<WG5101> the mind<WG5427> of the Spirit<WG4151> is, because<WG3754> He intercedes<WG1793> for the saints<WG40> according<WG2596> to [the will of] God.<WG2316>

And we know<WG3609> that God<WG2316> causes<WG4903> all<WG3956> things<WG3956> to work<WG4903> together<WG4903> for good<WG18> to those<WG3588> who love<WG25> God,<WG2316> to those<WG3588> who are called<WG2822> according<WG2596> to [His] purpose.<WG4286>

For whom<WG3739> He foreknew,<WG4267> He also<WG2532> predestined<WG4309> [to become] conformed<WG4832> to the image<WG1504> of His Son,<WG5207> that He might be the first-born among<WG1722> many<WG4183> brethren;<WG80>

and whom<WG3739> He predestined,<WG4309> these<WG3778> He also<WG2532> called;<WG2564> and whom<WG3739> He called,<WG2564> these<WG3778> He also<WG2532> justified;<WG1344> and whom<WG3739> He justified,<WG1344> these<WG3778> He also<WG2532> glorified.<WG1392>
What<WG5101> then<WG3767> shall we say<WG3004> to these<WG3778> things<WG3778>? If<WG1487> God<WG2316> [is] for us, who<WG5101> [is] against<WG2596> us?

He who<WG3739> did not spare<WG5339> His own<WG2398> Son,<WG5207> but delivered<WG3860> Him up for us all,<WG3956> how<WG4459> will He not also<WG2532> with Him freely<WG5483> give<WG5483> us all<WG3956> things<WG3956>?
Who<WG5101> will bring<WG1458> a charge<WG1458> against<WG2596> God<WG2316>'s elect<WG1588>? God is the one who justifies;<WG1344>

who<WG5101> is the one who condemns<WG2632>? Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> is He who died,<WG599> yes,<WG1161> rather<WG3123> who was raised,<WG1453> who<WG3739> is at the right<WG1188> hand<WG1188> of God,<WG2316> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> intercedes<WG1793> for us.

Who<WG5101> shall separate<WG5563> us from the love<WG26> of Christ<WG5547>? Shall tribulation,<WG2347> or<WG2228> distress,<WG4730> or<WG2228> persecution,<WG1375> or<WG2228> famine,<WG3042> or<WG2228> nakedness,<WG1132> or<WG2228> peril,<WG2794> or<WG2228> sword<WG3162>?

Just<WG2531> as it is written,<WG1125> "For Thy sake<WG1752> we are being put<WG2289> to death<WG2289> all<WG3650> day<WG2250> long; We were considered<WG3049> as sheep<WG4263> to be slaughtered.<WG4967>"
But in all<WG3956> these<WG3778> things<WG3778> we overwhelmingly<WG5245> conquer<WG5245> through<WG1223> Him who loved<WG25> us.

For I am convinced<WG3982> that neither<WG3777> death,<WG2288> nor<WG3777> life,<WG2222> nor<WG3777> angels,<WG32> nor<WG3777> principalities,<WG746> nor<WG3777> things<WG1764> present,<WG1764> nor<WG3777> things<WG3195> to come,<WG3195> nor<WG3777> powers,<WG1411>

nor<WG3777> height,<WG5313> nor<WG3777> depth,<WG899> nor<WG3777> any<WG5100> other<WG2087> created<WG2937> thing,<WG2937> shall be able<WG1410> to separate<WG5563> us from the love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> which is in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our Lord.<WG2962>
